content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the case involved two parties the plaintiff and the defendant the defendant was ordered to pay various fees and costs while the plaintiff was only responsible for a smaller fee the court resolved a matrimonial property dispute by awarding a skoda fabia car to the plaintiff the defendant was not required to pay for the costs of serving legal documents the case was based on a civil code article related to shareable property and the deviation of equal shares in a community property principle between spouses the plaintiff filed the lawsuit to end their marriage and claimed financial compensation for the car the court found fault on both parties and allowed the plaintiff to retain her married name and the car as her personal property the court also exempted the defendant from paying the costs of serving procedural documents and dismissed the plaintiffs claim for annulment costs

metadata.cost: 194.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 656.00 EUR (professional fees) + 3'165.75 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant; 656.00 EUR (stamp duty)by the plaintiff.
